name: AI #3427
description:
AI #3427 is a game made for the "Vimjam2 [8 bits to infinity]" game jam.

The requirment was "Boss", and the theme "On the edge".
I'm quite new to the whole game development thing, so there's probably a few bugs here and there.

How was the Boss requirment implemented?
You are playing as an AI with a robot body sent in to do test chambers,
Where the boss is giving you some instructions on how the game is played.

How was the Theme On the edge implemented?
If you move towards and edge, you will automatically jump.

Move left and right using
AD, Left and Right arrow.

Jump by moving towards an edge

Walljump by moving and looking towards a wall

Go straight down whilst mid air by pressing S, Spacebar or Down arrow.

Negate any jumping by holding down S, Spacebar or Down arrow
